Evaluation de la Banque Nationale de
            Developpement Economique (BNDE) - Burundi

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist in financing:
            (i) BNDE's foreign exchange requirements for its
            development finance operations during 1977-1978. (ii) two
            technical experts for BNDE's Industrial Development Unit.
